item.title: Afghan national arrested over alleged bomb threat in Texas: DHS
item.description: Investigators said they arrested an Afghan national on Tuesday who they allege was building a bomb.

item.title: Protesters arrested in NYC over possible ICE-related activity near Chinatown
item.description: Multiple people were arrested Saturday after a large group were protesting possible ICE-related activity near Chinatown.

item.title: Shopping mall shooting wounds 2, prompts Black Friday evacuation in the Bay Area
item.description: Police in California evacuated a shopping mall on one of the busiest shopping days of the year after a shooting left two people with gunshot wounds

item.title: WATCH: Military funeral in Kyiv for American volunteer fighter
item.description: ABC News’ Ian Pannell is in Kyiv, Ukraine, at the funeral of an American who lost his life fighting against Russia’s invasion.

item.title: LIVE: ABC News Live
item.description: 24/7 coverage of breaking news and live events
